properties.name: -s2-mix-blend-mode
properties.description: Controls blending mode for the panel. Similar to CSS mix-blend-mode, except normal for Panorama is with alpha blending.
properties.syntax: normal | multiply | screen | additive | SRGBadditive | opaque

properties.name: align
properties.description: Controls the horizontal and/or vertical alignment of content.

properties.name: animation
properties.description: Sets all animation properties.

properties.name: animation-delay
properties.description: Controls the delay before the animation starts.

properties.name: animation-direction
properties.description: The direction of the animation regarding time. Defaults to normal.

properties.name: animation-duration
properties.description: Controls the duration of an animation.

properties.name: animation-fill-mode
properties.description: Controls the fill mode of an animation.

properties.name: animation-iteration-count
properties.description: Controls the number of iterations to play for an animation.

properties.name: animation-name
properties.description: Name of animation to be used for keyframing.

properties.name: animation-timing-function
properties.description: Controls the type of animation to perform. Defaults to ease.
properties.syntax: none | ease | ease-in | ease-out | ease-in-out | linear | <cubic-bezier>

properties.name: background-color
properties.description: Sets the background fill color/gradient/combination for a panel.

properties.name: background-image
properties.description: Comma separated list of images or movies to draw in the background.

properties.name: background-img-opacity
properties.description: Sets the opacity of the background-image.

properties.name: background-position
properties.description: Controls the horizontal and vertical placement of the background image.

properties.name: background-repeat
properties.description: Controls if the background should be repeated in the horizontal and vertical directions.

properties.name: background-size
properties.description: Sets the horizontal and vertical dimensions used to draw the background image.

properties.name: blur
properties.description: Sets the amount of blur to apply to the panel and all it's children during composition.

properties.name: border
properties.description: Shorthand for setting panel border.

properties.name: border-bottom
properties.description: Shorthand for setting the bottom panel border.

properties.name: border-bottom-color
properties.description: Specifies border color for the bottom edge of the panel.

properties.name: border-bottom-left-radius
properties.description: Specifies border-radius for bottom-left corner which rounds off border and clips background/foreground content to rounded edge.

properties.name: border-bottom-right-radius
properties.description: Specifies border-radius for bottom-right corner which rounds off border and clips background/foreground content to rounded edge.

properties.name: border-bottom-style
properties.description: Specifies border style for the bottom edge of the panel.

properties.name: border-bottom-width
properties.description: Specifies border width for the bottom edge of the panel.

properties.name: border-color
properties.description: Specifies border color for panel.

properties.name: border-left
properties.description: Shorthand for setting the left panel border.

properties.name: border-left-color
properties.description: Specifies border color for the left edge of the panel.

properties.name: border-left-style
properties.description: Specifies border style for the left edge of the panel.

properties.name: border-left-width
properties.description: Specifies border width for the left edge of the panel.

properties.name: border-radius
properties.description: Shorthand to set border radius for all corners at once. Border radius rounds off corners of the panel, adjusting the border to smoothly round and also clipping background image/color and contents to the specified elliptical or circular values.

properties.name: border-right
properties.description: Shorthand for setting the right panel border.

properties.name: border-right-color
properties.description: Specifies border color for the right edge of the panel.

properties.name: border-right-style
properties.description: Specifies border style for the right edge of the panel.

properties.name: border-right-width
properties.description: Specifies border width for the right edge of the panel.

properties.name: border-style
properties.description: Specifies border style for panel.

properties.name: border-top
properties.description: Shorthand for setting the top panel border.

properties.name: border-top-color
properties.description: Specifies border color for the top edge of the panel.

properties.name: border-top-left-radius
properties.description: Specifies border-radius for top-left corner which rounds off border and clips background/foreground content to rounded edge.

properties.name: border-top-right-radius
properties.description: Specifies border-radius for top-right corner which rounds off border and clips background/foreground content to rounded edge.

properties.name: border-top-style
properties.description: Specifies border style for the top edge of the panel.

properties.name: border-top-width
properties.description: Specifies border width for the top edge of the panel.

properties.name: border-width
properties.description: Specifies border width for panel.

properties.name: box-shadow
properties.description: Specifies outer shadows for boxes, or inset shadows/glows.

properties.name: brightness
properties.description: Sets the brightness that applies to the panel and all it's children during composition.

properties.name: clip
properties.description: Specifies a clip region within the panel, where contents will be clipped at render time.

properties.name: color
properties.description: Sets the foreground fill color/gradient/combination for a panel. This color is the color used to render text within the panel.

properties.name: context-menu-arrow-position
properties.description: Specifies where to point the arrow of a context menu at on this panel.

properties.name: context-menu-body-position
properties.description: Specifies where to position the body of a context menu relative to this panel.

properties.name: context-menu-position
properties.description: Specifies where to position a context menu relative to this panel.

properties.name: contrast
properties.description: Sets the contrast that applies to the panel and all it's children during composition.

properties.name: flow-children
properties.description: Controls the direction for the children of the panel to flow.
properties.syntax: none | down | right | up | left | down-wrap | right-wrap | up-wrap | left-wrap

properties.name: font-family
properties.description: Specifies the font face to use.

properties.name: font-size
properties.description: Specifies the target font face height in pixels.

properties.name: font-style
properties.description: Specifies the font style to use.

properties.name: font-weight
properties.description: Specifies the font weight to use.

properties.name: height
properties.description: Sets the height for this panel.

properties.name: horizontal-align
properties.description: Controls the horizontal alignment of content. To change both this and vertical alignment in one property, use align. Defaults to left.

properties.name: hue-rotation
properties.description: Sets the hue rotation to apply to the panel and all it's children during composition.

properties.name: img-shadow
properties.description: Specifies image shadows. The shadow shape will match the image the panel can generate, and this is only meaningful for images.

properties.name: letter-spacing
properties.description: Sets the space between letters for text in a string.

properties.name: line-height
properties.description: Specifies the line height (distance between top edge of line above and line below) to use for text. By default this is unset and a value that matches the font-size reasonably will be used automatically.

properties.name: margin
properties.description: Sets the space between this panel to another panel.

properties.name: margin-bottom
properties.description: Sets the space between the bottom of this panel to the top of another panel.

properties.name: margin-left
properties.description: Sets the space between the left-side of this panel to the right-side of another panel.

properties.name: margin-right
properties.description: Sets the space between the right-side of this panel to the left-side of another panel.

properties.name: margin-top
properties.description: Sets the space between the top of this panel to the bottom of another panel.

properties.name: max-height
properties.description: Sets the maximum height of the panel.

properties.name: max-width
properties.description: Sets the maximum width of the panel.

properties.name: min-height
properties.description: Sets the minimum height of the panel.

properties.name: min-width
properties.description: Sets the minimum width of the panel.

properties.name: opacity
properties.description: Sets the opacity or amount of transparency applied to the panel and all it's children during composition. Default of 1.0 means fully opaque, 0.0 means fully transparent.

properties.name: opacity-mask
properties.description: Applies an image as an opacity mask that stretches to the panel bounds and fades out it's content based on the alpha channel.

properties.name: opacity-mask-scroll-down
properties.description: Overrides opacity-mask when the panel can scroll down, based on the overflow property, or when the height of the content in the panel is larger than the height of its layout.

properties.name: opacity-mask-scroll-up
properties.description: Overrides opacity-mask when the panel can scroll up, based on the overflow property.

properties.name: opacity-mask-scroll-up-down
properties.description: Overrides opacity-mask when the panel can scroll up and down, based on the overflow property.

properties.name: overflow
properties.description: Specifies what to do with contents that overflow the available space for the panel.

properties.name: padding
properties.description: Sets the space between the content and the edge of the panel.

properties.name: padding-bottom
properties.description: Sets the space between the content and the bottom edge of the panel.

properties.name: padding-left
properties.description: Sets the space between the content and the left edge of the panel.

properties.name: padding-right
properties.description: Sets the space between the content and the right edge of the panel.

properties.name: padding-top
properties.description: Sets the space between the content and the top edge of the panel.

properties.name: perspective
properties.description: Sets the perspective depth space available for children of the panel. Default of 1000 would mean that children at 1000px zpos are right at the viewers eye, -1000px are just out of view distance faded to nothing.

properties.name: perspective-origin
properties.description: Sets the perspective origin which will be used when transforming children of this panel. This can be thought of as the camera x/y position relative to the panel.

properties.name: position
properties.description: Sets the x, y, and z position for a panel, in pixels or percentage. Must not be in a flowing layout.

properties.name: pre-transform-rotate2d
properties.description: Sets 2 dimensional rotation degrees that apply to the quad for this panel prior to 3 dimensional transforms. This rotation applies without perspective and leaves the panel centered at the same spot as it started.

properties.name: pre-transform-scale2d
properties.description: Sets 2 dimensional X/Y scale factors that apply to the quad for this panel prior to 3 dimensional transforms. This scaling applies without perspective and leaves the panel centered at the same spot as it started. Default of 1.0 means no scaling, 0.5 would be half size.

properties.name: saturation
properties.description: Sets the amount of saturation to apply to the panel and all it's children during composition. Default of 1.0 means no adjustment, 0.0 means fully desaturated to gray scale, greater than 1.0 means over-saturation.

properties.name: sound
properties.description: Specifies a sound name to play when this selector is applied.

properties.name: sound-out
properties.description: Specifies a sound name to play when this selector is removed.

properties.name: sound-trans
properties.description: Specifies a sound name to play when this selector is applied and the value was previously set.

properties.name: text-align
properties.description: Specifies the horizontal text alignment for text within this panel, defaults to left.

properties.name: text-decoration
properties.description: Specifies the decoration for text within this panel, defaults to none.

properties.name: text-overflow
properties.description: Controls truncation of text that doesn't fit in a panel. 'clip' means to simply truncate (on char boundaries), 'ellipsis' means to end with '...', and 'shrink' means lower the font size to fit. 'noclip' allows the text to overflow based on the 'overflow' style. Default to ellipsis.

properties.name: text-shadow
properties.description: Specifies text shadows. The shadow shape will match the text the panel can generate,and this is only meaningful for labels.

properties.name: text-shadow-fast
properties.description: Specifies basic text drop shadows for fast rendering. Only meaningful for labels.

properties.name: text-transform
properties.description: Specifies the transform for text within this panel, defaults to none.

properties.name: texture-sampling
properties.description: Controls texture sampling mode for the panel. Set to alpha-only to use the textures alpha data across all 3 color channels.

properties.name: tooltip-arrow-position
properties.description: Specifies where to point the arrow of a tooltip at on this panel.

properties.name: tooltip-body-position
properties.description: Specifies where to position the body of a tooltip relative to this panel.

properties.name: tooltip-position
properties.description: Specifies where to position a tooltip relative to this panel.

properties.name: transform
properties.description: Sets the transforms to apply to the panel in 2d or 3d space.

properties.name: transform-origin
properties.description: Sets the transform origin about which transforms will be applied. Default is 50% 50% on the panel so a rotation/scale is centered.

properties.name: transition
properties.description: Specifies which properties should transition smoothly to new values if a class/pseudo class changes the styles.

properties.name: transition-delay
properties.description: Specifies the delay in seconds to use for transition properties on this panel.

properties.name: transition-duration
properties.description: Specifies the durating in seconds to use for transition properties on this panel.

properties.name: transition-property
properties.description: Specifies which properties should transition smoothly to new values if a class/pseudo class changes the styles.

properties.name: transition-timing-function
properties.description: Specifies the timing function to use for transition properties on this panel.

properties.name: ui-scale
properties.description: Specifies a scale to apply to this panel's layout and all descendants. This scale happens at the layout level ratherthan the bitmap level, so things like text will increase their font size rather than just bitmap scaling.

properties.name: ui-scale-x
properties.description: Specifies a scale on the X axis to apply to this panel's layout and all descendants.

properties.name: ui-scale-y
properties.description: Specifies a scale on the Y axis to apply to this panel's layout and all descendants.

properties.name: ui-scale-z
properties.description: Specifies a scale on the Z axis to apply to this panel's layout and all descendants.

properties.name: vertical-align
properties.description: Controls the vertical alignment of content. To change both this and horizontal alignment in one property, use align. Defaults to top.

properties.name: visibility
properties.description: Controls if the panel is visible and is included in panel layout.

properties.name: wash-color
properties.description: Specifies a 'wash' color, which means a color that will be blended over the panel and all it's children at composition time, tinting them. The alpha value of the color determines the intensity of the tinting.

properties.name: wash-color-fast
properties.description: Fast version of wash-color.

properties.name: white-space
properties.description: Controls white-space wrapping on rendered text.

properties.name: width
properties.description: Sets the width for this panel.

properties.name: x
properties.description: Sets the x position for a panel, in pixels. Defaults to 0. Must not be in a flowing layout.

properties.name: y
properties.description: Sets the y position for a panel, in pixels. Defaults to 0. Must not be in a flowing layout.

properties.name: z
properties.description: Sets the z position for a panel, in pixels. Defaults to 0. Must not be in a flowing layout.

properties.name: z-index
properties.description: Sets the z-index for a panel, panels will be sorted and painted in order within a parent panel.

pseudoClasses.name: :activationdisabled
pseudoClasses.description: Panel is disabled for activation, may still be enabled for focus (normal disabled disallows all input/focus).

pseudoClasses.name: :active
pseudoClasses.description: Panel is being actively used (mouse-down on the panel).

pseudoClasses.name: :descendantfocus
pseudoClasses.description: A descendant of the panel has keyboard focus.

pseudoClasses.name: :inspect
pseudoClasses.description: Panel is being inspected by the debugger.

pseudoClasses.name: :layoutfailed
pseudoClasses.description: Panel failed to load requested layout file, and thus may want to display specially.

pseudoClasses.name: :layoutloading
pseudoClasses.description: Panel is in-progress loading it's layout file and thus may want to display specially.

pseudoClasses.name: :parentdisabled
pseudoClasses.description: A parent of this panel is disabled, thus implicitly disabling it.
